enDesc: Written by Abraham Danzig (1748-1820), Kitzur Sefer Haredim is an abridgement of Rabbi Elazar Azcari’s Sefer Haredim. Sefer Haredim, published posthumously, is an ethical treatise written by the author of the piyyut, Yedid Nefesh.
